text: Carlos Manuel FÃ©lix Moedas (born 10 August 1970) is a Portuguese civil engineer, economist and politician. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party (PSD). Moedas is the 78th Mayor of Lisbon since 2021. From 2014 until 2019, Moedas was the European Commissioner covering the portfolio of Research, Science and Innovation under the leadership of President Jean-Claude Juncker. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lisbon Category:Portuguese mayors Category:European Union politicians Category:Portuguese engineers Category:Economists
title: Carlos Moedas
